entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 early this afternoon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
